Class IdUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacorb.poa.util.IdUtil

  • public final class IdUtil
extends Object
    This class collects some oid related basic routines.
    Version:
    1.05, 21/01/00, RT
    Author:
    Reimo Tiedemann, FU Berlin

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] concat(byte[] first, byte[] second) 
      static byte[] createId()
      creates an id as a concatenation of the current time in msec and 4 random bytes
      static boolean equals(byte[] first, byte[] second) 
      static boolean equals(byte[] first, byte[] second, int len)
      compares first len bytes of two byte arrays
      static byte[] extract(byte[] id, int offset, int len)
      extracts len bytes from id, the first byte to be copied is at index offset
      static byte[] toId(long l)
      converts the number l into a byte array
